sys_script_include.name: Test

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1c2cfc1e1bfc1410c695fc88cc4bcb15
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_83068_cisco_lab.Test</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Test</name><script><![CDATA[var Test = Class.create();
Test.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    _getUserGroup: function() {
		var userId = this.getParameter('sysparm_usernameVal');
        gs.addErrorMessage("MMM: " + userId);
        var UserGroupGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        UserGroupGR.addQuery("user.user_name", userId);
        UserGroupGR.query();
        while (UserGroupGR.next()) {
            var userGroup = UserGroupGR.group.name.getDisplayValue();
        }

        if (userGroup == "Dev/Test") {
            return "devtest";
        } else if (userGroup === "UAT") {
            return "uat";
        } else if (userGroup == "Production") {
            return "production";
        } else userGroup = "";
        return "null-";

    },

    type: 'Test'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-17 18:06:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>1c2cfc1e1bfc1410c695fc88cc4bcb15</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future" source="x_83068_cisco_lab">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1c2cfc1e1bfc1410c695fc88cc4bcb15</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-17 18:22:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
